## Remirror.componentWillUnmount() method

Called when the component unmounts and is responsible for cleanup.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
componentWillUnmount(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

- Removes listeners for the editor blur and focus events - Destroys the state for each plugin - Destroys the prosemirror view
